Html:
Hi Kozw.

Just a simple question: is this beautiful project still in progress or you have stopped to work on it?

Thanks in advance.

It's been way to long since I've done some substantial work on mui, the main reason being that I've been busy with other projects.

One bit of good news; MUI was initially derived from XAML Spy v1, and became a separate project. XAML Spy v1 did not depend on MUI. XAML Spy v2 does, it uses the MUI 1.0.5 release. So I'm dogfooding MUI, which will bring improvements back to this project.

So no, work on MUI has not stopped.
